title: Spellcasting
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

The [Spellcasting]() skill determines how proficient a character is at casting [spells](/Spell "Spell") from memory. A higher Spellcasting level gives your character more [spell levels](/Spell_level "Spell level") and increases your max [MP](/MP "MP"). It also has a minor effect on your [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") and [spell success](/Spell_success "Spell success") rate (equivalent to having 1/4 of a level in every other spell school).

Note that the max MP increase granted by Spellcasting is not cumulative with that of [Invocations](/Invocations "Invocations"); only the higher bonus of the two is used. For this purpose, each level of Spellcasting is twice as effective as Invocations.

[Djinn](/Djinn "Djinn") do not get any HP or MP bonus from Spellcasting; they only benefit from the increase to power and success rate.

## History
